title: Anyone want to "trade down" their BL 350, Carolina Brights, Lenox, or Uzit?
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Anyone want to "trade down" their BL 350, Carolina Brights, Lenox, or Uzit?
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys,

Probably a longshot, but:

I'm looking to trade any of these plus cash or some other thing(s) for a nicer looking card with the same back.  Grades are not that important to me, but I don't want any paper loss on the back.  Ideally I'm hoping to find Major Leaguers rather than Minor Leaguers, but I know I can't be too picky.

I have probably 300 different t206s that I could trade.  I have multiple copies of most backs below CB on the back scarcity rankings, including Hindus, Cycle 460s, ABs, Old Mills, Cycle 350, etc.

Thanks for looking!

Luke
